venue.name: La Sala de Puerto Rico (2nd floor MIT Student Center)

item.description:
Arrrr, a musical about pirates! Young Frederic, finally free of his 21-year apprenticeship to a band of tender-hearted pirates, falls in love with Mabel, the daughter of a Major-General. Unfortunately, the Pirate King and the nursemaid he scorned take advantage of his sense of duty to keep him from enjoying his newfound happiness for long...

There are multiple performances:

Friday, November 30, 8:00 PM
Saturday, December 1, 8:00 PM
Sunday, December 2, 2:00 PM
Thursday, December 6, 8:00 PM
Friday, December 7, 8:00 PM
Saturday, December 8, 2:00 PM

http://web.mit.edu/gsp/www/Archive/2012fall_pirates/index.html

Tix are $5-$15 depending on whether or not you're a student. The Thursday show is FREE for MIT students.

I'll be playing violin in the show; we can meet in the lobby afterwards to mingle. There is usually a reception on opening night.
item.name: MIT Gilbert & Sullivan Players Present: "The Pirates of Penzance"
